names.description: Name overrides for the splits. Map each autosplit id to a string or an array of strings.

icons.description: Icon overrides for the splits. Map each autosplit id to a autosplit id or an array of autosplit ids.

ordered.description: Ordered splits improve performance and are required for certain splits (e.g. KingsPass).

endTriggeringAutosplit.description: Whether to end time at the last autosplit. Set this to false for full-game runs, where time ends on a final cutscene.

startTriggeringAutosplit.description: Autosplit to use to start the timer, rather than starting on new file

endingSplit.description: Info for the last split if it's a game-ending split rather than an autosplit

properties.name: The name to appear in the LiveSplit UI
properties.icon: The autosplit name whose icon to use (e.g. RadianceBoss, HollowKnightBoss)

categoryName.description: The category name on the associated speedrun.com board.

gameName.description: The game name on the associated speedrun.com board.
